 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגַר‎</span>] **verb** ==gird, gird on, gird oneself== (Late Hebrew ***id***., Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֲגַר‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hinder, restrain***, so Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***agâru***</u></abbr>, ***surround***, in derivatives, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>W 105 ff.</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מחגרת‎</span> (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***enclosed space, district***, etc.), [[BDB#DHM|DHM]] in [[BDB#MV|MV]]; also proper name, of deity and location <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגר‎</span>, [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>3. 81. 93</sup> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. 1, No. 49 etc</sup>.) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָֽגְרָה‎</span> [[Prov.31.17|Prov 31:17]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהָגַרְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Exod.29.9|Exod 29:9]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָֽגְרוּ‎</span> [[Isa.15.3|Isa 15:3]]; [[Lam.2.10|Lam 2:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְח‎</span> consecutive [[Ezek.7.18|Ezek 7:18]]; [[Ezek.27.31|Ezek 27:31]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָחְגֹּר‎</span> [[Lev.16.4|Lev 16:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּחְגֹּר‎</span> [[Lev.8.7|Lev 8:7]] (twice in verse) + 4 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְגְּרֶ֑הָ‎</span> [[Ps.109.19|Ps 109:19]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְגֹּר‎</span> [[Ps.76.11|Ps 76:11]] (but on text see below); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְגְּרוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.44.18|Ezek 44:18]]; [[2Sam.22.46|2Sam 22:46]] (but on text of both see below), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּחְגְּרוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.25.13|1Sam 25:13]]; [[1Kgs.20.32|1Kgs 20:32]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְגֹּרְנָה‎</span> [[Ps.65.13|Ps 65:13]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּחְגְּרוּ‎</span> [[Deut.1.41|Deut 1:41]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגֹּר‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.29|2Kgs 4:29]]; [[2Kgs.9.1|2Kgs 9:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגוֺר‎</span> [[Ps.45.4|Ps 45:4]] feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִגְרִיֿ‎</span> [[Jer.6.26|Jer 6:26]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חִגְרוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.25.13|1Sam 25:13]] + 3 t.; feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגֹּרְנָה‎</span> [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲג֖וֺרָה‎</span> [[Isa.32.11|Isa 32:11]] (see below); ***Infinitive cstr***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחֲגֹר‎</span> [[Isa.22.12|Isa 22:12]] ***Participle act***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹגֵר‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.11|1Kgs 20:11]]; [[2Kgs.3.21|2Kgs 3:21]] ***passive*** masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגוּר‎</span> [[Judg.18.11|Judg 18:11]] + 5 t.; feminine construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגֻרַתֿ‎</span> [[Joel.1.8|Joel 1:8]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגוּרִים‎</span> [[Exod.12.11|Exod 12:11]]; [[Judg.18.16|Judg 18:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגֻרִים‎</span> [[Dan.10.5|Dan 10:5]] — 

**1.** transitive, ***gird*** some one, with girdle; with 2 accusative [[Exod.29.9|Exod 29:9]]; [[Lev.8.13|Lev 8:13]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]); passive, ***girded*** with ephod (accusative) [[1Sam.2.18|1Sam 2:18]]; [[2Sam.6.14|2Sam 6:14]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Dan.10.5|Dan 10:5]], with accusative and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>, figurative [[Prov.31.17|Prov 31:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגרה בְּעוז מתניה‎</span> [[Lev.8.7|Lev 8:7]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#P|P]]), with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מתנים‎</span> ***gird up thy loins***, i.e. make ready to go [[2Kgs.4.29|2Kgs 4:29]]; [[2Kgs.9.1|2Kgs 9:1]], passive [[Exod.12.11|Exod 12:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); compare probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲג֖וֺרָה עַלחֲֿלָצָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Isa.32.11|Isa 32:11]] ***gird upon the loins*** (2nd accusative omitted); on verb. form as Imperative feminine plural see [[BDB#AE|AE]] [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 226 a</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; &gt; as masculine singular [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 234 a</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:48»§ 48</sup>. 5 [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 591 d</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>§ 20. 12.</sup> 

**2.** ***gird on, bind on*** (= gird oneself with), a girdle [[Ps.109.19|Ps 109:19]] (in simile); so especially with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂקים‎</span> of mourning [[Isa.15.3|Isa 15:3]]; [[Isa.22.12|Isa 22:12]]; [[Lam.2.10|Lam 2:10]]; [[Ezek.7.18|Ezek 7:18]]; [[Ezek.27.31|Ezek 27:31]]; [[2Sam.3.31|2Sam 3:31]]; [[Jer.4.8|Jer 4:8]]; [[Jer.6.26|Jer 6:26]]; [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]] also [[1Kgs.20.32|1Kgs 20:32]] (with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂק‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> before <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מתנים‎</span>); passive, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> before object of mourning [[Joel.1.8|Joel 1:8]] (simile); absolute (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂק‎</span> omitted) [[Joel.1.13|Joel 1:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ספדו‎</span>); followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶד‎</span> [[1Sam.25.13|1Sam 25:13]] (3 t. in verse); [[Deut.1.41|Deut 1:41]]; [[Ps.45.4|Ps 45:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חרד על יָרֵךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span>, so [[Judg.3.16|Judg 3:16]]; [[1Sam.17.39|1Sam 17:39]] (followed by accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>); with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חגורה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> [[2Kgs.3.21|2Kgs 3:21]] absolute [[1Kgs.20.11|1Kgs 20:11]] passive [[Judg.18.11|Judg 18:11]]; [[Judg.18.16|Judg 18:16]]; [[Judg.18.17|Judg 18:17]]; [[2Sam.20.8|2Sam 20:8]]b (where read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span> [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] — not [[BDB#We|We]]), [[2Sam.21.16|2Sam 21:16]] read perhaps also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגוּר‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲגוֺר‎</span> [[2Sam.20.8|2Sam 20:8]] c, so [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]. 

**3.** intransitive ***gird oneself***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> of thing [[Lev.16.4|Lev 16:4]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַיָּ֑זַע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יַח‎</span> ***they shall not gird themselves with sweat*** (?), but strike out [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] Sgfr; with accusative of thing (figurative) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּיל גְּבָעוֺת תַּח‎</span> [[Ps.65.13|Ps 65:13]] ***with rejoicing the hills gird themselves***; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאֵרִית חֵמֹת תַּחְ‎</span> [[Ps.76.11|Ps 76:11]] ***with a remnant (residue) of wraths thou girdest thyself***, so [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#VB|VB]]; but very doubtful; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Bö|Bö]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחָגָּ֑ךָ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחגר‎</span>; [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] Ka omit line as corrupt; compare further [[BDB#Che|Che]] and critical note — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיַחְגְּרוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.22.46|2Sam 22:46]] is text error for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיַחְרְגוּ‎</span>, compare \|\| [[Ps.18.46|Ps 18:46]] so [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] and others
